summary:
A couple of weeks ago, Jay reached out to see if I’d be like to be a guest on Conduit and of course I immediately said yes. 
We spoke about some of my projects including what I’m doing with EchoFeed and then I was challenged[1] to make a site, which I did.  In the super conductors post-show Jay asked me about British cars and I had to channel all of my knowledge from Top Gear and Grand Tour...
title: I Was a Guest on Conduit

summary:
"When did Robb last watch Mean Girls. " A question that no one except me cares about but here we are, writing about a website I made to answer that one question. 
TL;DRSee the site here...
title: How Long Since I Watched Mean Girls?

summary:
Scammers are hacking Google Forms to send email to victims that come from google. com. 
Brian Krebs reports on the effects...
title: Scams Based on Fake Google Emails

summary:
Documenting an 1115 ft radio tower climb

title: Documenting an 1115 ft radio tower climb
